snippet: Scientists are experimenting with a new procedure to reduce high blood pressure in patients who do not respond to medication.
abstract: Doctors are experimenting with a new electrical procedure to treat high blood pressure in patients who are resistant to standard treatments; procedure involves pulses of radio-frequency energy that are delivered to the arteries leading to a patient's kidney.
lead_paragraph: Scientists are experimenting with a new procedure to reduce high blood pressure in patients who do not respond to medication.

headline.seo: Experimental Surgery Targets Stubbornly High Blood Pressure
headline.main: To Cut Blood Pressure, Nerves Get a Jolt
headline.print_headline: To Cut Blood Pressure, Nerves Get a Jolt
